titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the exclusion of certain income of foreign sales corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/12/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the termination, beginning January 1, 2001, of subpart C ( Taxation of Foreign Sales Corporations) of Part III (Income from Sources Without the United States) of Chapter N (Tax Based on Income From Income From Sources Within or Without the United States).
